summary: Versatile marketing leader with 15+ years of experience in corporate marketing, business development and account management for Fortune 1000, niche and startup companies. Proven ability to grow revenues and brand loyalty in B2C and B2B markets through innovative campaigns and targeted marketing programs. MBA in Management and BBA in Marketing.

experience.title: Marketing Consultant
experience.description: Marketing services and consulting working with diverse companies in healthcare and technology. Client roles vary as Consultant, Contractor, and Employee in marketing leadership and managing all areas of the marketing function and resources.

experience.title: Marketing Director/Consultant
experience.description: Increased profits by 60% in one year through restructure of business line. A B2B technology & healthcare solutions provider and VAR for GE Imaging reporting to matrix executive leadership. Oversaw marketing for three divisions to support revenue pipeline across diverse vertical markets. Lead facilitator of GE Imaging IT marketing plan including demand generation, brand development, and marketing communication initiatives; utilizing Salesforce, Autotask, WordPress, and Project management practices. Developed content for digital and traditional including presentations, customer stories, video, blog, emails, and website. Managed multiple events across vertical markets in business and healthcare supporting reseller channel strategies and new brand and product packaging, establishing launch programs, brand standards, calendar, and action plans.

experience.title: Sr. Director, Marketing
experience.description: A B2B healthcare informatics solutions for Employers and Payers; reporting to President/Cofounder. Developed brand and UX experience for two new technology platforms; functionality, design, and positioning. Managed communications, brand standards, and proposals for consulting services, and diagnostic reports coordinating team. Created weekly blog strategy to drive leads, SEO, and content; managed public relations including media, press releases, and distribution to target industry contacts. Initiated email campaigns, webinars, and social media to build brand via targeted campaigns for lead generation and other content including whitepapers. Initiated CRM evaluation and selection to build-out system for contacts, leads tracking, and email integration. Developed rebranding plan to establish primary and secondary brands for current and new products including competitive analysis, positioning, market research, testing, naming, product roadmap, segmentation, and identity creation. Developed 2015 marketing plan, calendar & budget to generate $1M in organic growth across the largest 750 plan sponsors. Managed more than 45 branded events including sponsorship and exhibits with AHIP, AMCP, World at Work, SALGBA and other national industry organizations reaching health plans and sponsors. Developed new brand website strategy with engagement tools, content, and rebranding launching in 6 weeks.

experience.title: Marketing Director/Consultant
experience.description: National leader in hospital revenue cycle solutions; reported to President (company-wide cost reductions). Launched new brand/solution with identify creation, brand standards, outbound messages, events, websites, and campaigns to market to transition customer base and build >$1M in new revenue in YR1. Developed annual marketing plan/budget for hospital markets with PR, >20 new events, and sponsorships working with HFMA, AAHAM, & NAHAM at local/regional/national levels. Managed vendors & reduced spend by >$50K. Led market position to generate >$50M in qualified funnel of 2014 revenue; tracking 400% in organic sales and 75% referral. Rebuilt corporate and patient-facing websites, Facebook, and LinkedIn tracking metrics and content for SEO & SEM to manage MRA voice and offset competitors' inroads.

experience.title: Director of Marketing & Executive Team Member
experience.description: A B2B healthcare IT & RCM startup for physicians/medical groups; company folded after two years; reported to CEO. Targeted physicians in 28 states/35 specialties converting customers for EHR licenses and revenue cycle management services. Developed new software launch for revenue cycle including brand strategy, digital promotion, user events, and PR: $1M YR1. Facilitated over 25 trade show events per year supporting national, regional and community initiatives. Rebranded practice management software and services transitioning over 300 independent practices to new solution. Established new US lead-gen team for US including CRM, market data, reporting and talent for 25% of revenue pipeline. Launched new website design and related communication strategies; developed advertising, trade events and public relations. Built a social media strategy including key sites, blog, ad words, PPC, SEO, and content development to build leads and traffic. Established marketing intelligence function across 300,000 physicians; defined key targets by specialties and campaigns for each; analyzed engagement, pipeline, and market trends using CRM, research, and satisfaction studies. Managed a team of 10 including lead-gen specialists and outsourced vendors; member of the Executive team.

experience.title: Director of Marketing & Executive Team Member
experience.description: Aftermarket auto parts distributor/retailer, $2B for B2B/B2C; reported to General Manager/Corporate VP. Recruited by a new startup with 31% sales increase and >$48M in 2010. Managed more than 100 trade and association events across North America. Relaunched brand with new positioning strategy leveraging market research and equity with entirely new website, ad campaign, and e-marketing vehicles. Stabilized sales to $37M in 2009. Initiated a business review and strategic plan for the largest retail customer (3,400 locations) worth $5M in sales for 2010. Grew business 42% versus 2009. Managed and contributed as executive staff member and reestablished market and sales focus, channel strategies and momentum for new sales organization. Annual budget of >$2M spend with >25 branded customer promotion programs.

experience.title: Channel Marketing Manager
experience.description: A $150M retail business of a $2B company; strategically managed >$20M in customer merchandising, in-line product and promotion programs for retail national accounts. Created $5M new brand, Designer Collection program to retailers and e-tailers: new products, packaging, promotions, Internet advertising, and merchandising. Led project management, China sourcing, and store rollout. Established Lowe's marketing program with $20M annual revenue; managed marketing teams and agencies to upgrade marketing quality.

experience.title: Sr. Marketing Manager & Consultant
experience.description: Start-up B2B company in speed clinical trial enrollment; created start-up marketing and led implementation for brand, sales, channel partners, and marketing with $1M pipeline. Generated $400K in closed contracts in first six months and a $1.2M pipeline targeting pharma, research, and physicians. Strategic marketing initiatives and trade show leadership.

experience.title: Strategic Market Manager
experience.description: Annual sales: $350M; A B2B technology services, data, and software division of Reed Elsevier. Responsible for Brand/Product Mgt., Customer Service, Business Development, and Renewal revenues of $2.1M annually. Led 18% growth and the relaunch of a database software product; directed market research and marketing plans for multiple audiences and segments. Led acquisitions and mergers evaluation and initial interest.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
experience.description: Design leader and marketer of gift-wrap, bags, and accessories to retail channels. Created $30M revenue programs for warehouse clubs, mass merchants, and dollar chains. Launched new premium gift wrap line and branding; grew revenues through private label programs; created three licensing programs and led merchandising systems development.

experience.title: Brand Manager
experience.description: Berol brand management; promoted to Sharpie Brand Manager; managed multiple product lines with a $3M annual marketing budget; achieved 27% sales growth; led national campaigns, pricing strategies, and distribution initiatives; developed campaigns to expand reach and improve market share.

certifications: Strategy Facilitation Certification - Leadership Strategies Group (2010)
